existing_features.title: Create a single-page Rose Day website experience dedicated to the user's girlfriend, with romantic copy and a clear Rose Day theme.
Add personalization inputs (client-side) so the user can set: girlfriend name, sender name, and a custom message, and immediately preview the updated page.
Include a small interactive “Rose Day moments” section (client-side) such as 3–6 clickable cards/steps (e.g., Compliment, Memory, Promise) that reveal short messages when clicked.
Implement a coherent, distinctive romantic visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across the site (avoid a default/template look).
Generate and add custom static images for the site (hero/illustration + small decorative assets) and render them from the frontend as static assets.
